properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, ENROLL_DATE, STATUS, PHONE FROM TB_MEMBER
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, EMAIL, ADDRESS, PHONE, ENROLL_DATE, STATUS FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEMBER_NAME =?, EMAIL =?, ADDRESS =?, PHONE =?, STATUS =?, UPDATE_DATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT THEATER_NO, THEATER_UPDATE, LOCATION_NAME, THEATER_NAME, C.LOCATION_CODE, MAP_LINK FROM TB_THEATER C, TB_LOCATION L WHERE C.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE

INSERT INTO TB_THEATER( THEATER_NO, THEATER_NAME, THEATER_ADDR, MAP_LINK, LOCATION_CODE )
VALUES( SEQ_THERNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ? )
SELECT THEATER_NO, THEATER_NAME, THEATER_ADDR, MAP_LINK, LOCATION_NAME, C.LOCATION_CODE, THEATER_UPDATE FROM TB_THEATER C, TB_LOCATION L WHERE C.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE AND THEATER_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_THEATER SET THEATER_NAME = ?, THEATER_ADDR = ?, MAP_LINK = ? , LOCATION_CODE = ?, THEATER_UPDATE = SYSDATE WHERE THEATER_NO = ?
SELECT C.THEATER_NO, C.THEATER_UPDATE, L.LOCATION_NAME, C.THEATER_NAME, C.LOCATION_CODE FROM TB_THEATER C INNER JOIN TB_LOCATION L ON C.LOCATION_CODE = L.LOCATION_CODE WHERE ? LIKE '%'||?||'%'
